thread.title: Holidaymaker dies ‘after Pontins staff pinned him down'
thread.title_full: Holidaymaker dies ‘after Pontins staff pinned him down'

title: Holidaymaker dies ‘after Pontins staff pinned him down'
text: Father, 38, dies during half term horror after ‘Pontins camp staff restrained him following a bust-up over a child bullying his son’ Paul Gladwell, 38, is believed to have died after being 'restrained' by security He was involved in a tussle with another parent at a Pontins holiday camp Police were called and he was arrested but on way to station he became ill Ambulance was called and he was taken to hospital but he died today His sister-in-law claims police carried him into a riot van and said he was 'asleep' 'when in actual fact he was unconscious due to lack of oxygen to the brain'
